content: the mosaic starburst washcloth/dishcloth crochet pattern uses overlay mosaic in the round from the center out the pattern comes with written instructions a chart and a video to help you create the project by following the chart you can figure out how to expand the pattern to make a bigger square would make a good baby blanket find more washcloths in the winter washcloth series pattern bundle- a roundup hosted by two brothers blankets https //juniperandoakes--twobrothersblankets thrivecart com/2025-winter-washcloths-pattern-bundle/ ref=gosadi indulge in the art of crochet with our mosaic starburst washcloth pattern designed to elevate your kitchen or bathroom decor this intermediate-level project showcases a stunning mosaic star design perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your home whether you re a seasoned crocheter or looking to expand your skills this pattern provides a rewarding and engaging experience explore the world of crochet with our detailed written instructions and video tutorial ensuring you achieve a flawless finish every time **unique features-** intricate mosaic starburst design intermediate skill level for a challenging yet achievable project detailed written pattern with video tutorial for guidance works up quickly in one piece for minimal finishing versatile size options available for customization **materials needed-** stitch markers hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn i love this cotton aran weight 130-160 yards gauge by 8 round = 4 inches in pattern as written
